Mode.name: OP DES
Mode.Description: Open Descent (OP DES) provides a rapid descent using selected speed and idle thrust. The mode ignores vertical constraints in the flight plan.
Mode.Activation: Activated by pulling the Altitude selector knob when the selected altitude is below the current altitude.
Mode.Behavior: The aircraft pitches to maintain selected speed while autothrust commands idle thrust. The mode continues until the selected altitude is approached, at which point the system transitions to ALT*.
